properties.title: The Brook Theatre
properties.description: The Brook Theatre, Old Town Hall, The Brook, Chatham, Kent, ME4 4SEWebsite http://www.thebrooktheatre.co.uk/About Situated in Chatham's Old Town Hall. This is a thriving arts centre where you can explore theatre, dance classes, gallery exhibitions and arts workshops. The 400-seat auditorium offers you professional theatre, community productions, jazz and folk evenings, a children's Christmas show and Medway Comedy Club, while the regular Studio Showcase evenings offer a more intimate theatre experience.

properties.title: The Central Theatre
properties.description: Central Hall, 170 High Street, Chatham, Kent, ME4 4ASWebsite http://www.thecentraltheatre.co.uk/About A beautiful 960-seat venue in Chatham High Street.
